Class AdapterBasedPolygonizeGraph

java.lang.Object

      com.vividsolutions.jts.operation.polygonize.AdapterBasedPolygonizeGraph

public class AdapterBasedPolygonizeGraph
extends com.vividsolutions.jts.planargraph.PlanarGraph

Polygonizer graph which stores its edges in a adapter based collection.

Author:
Alvaro Zabala

deleteDangles

public java.util.Collection deleteDangles()
Marks all edges from the graph which are "dangles". Dangles are which are incident on a node with degree 1. This process is recursive, since removing a dangling edge may result in another edge becoming a dangle. In order to handle large recursion depths efficiently, an explicit recursion stack is used

Returns:
a List containing the LineStrings that formed dangles
